item.title: The Witch Trials of J.K. Rowling - Chapter 7: What If You're Wrong?
item.description: Hello, dear listener. I’m Megan, host of this series. And before we get into the show, I wanted to take a minute to tell you about our sponsor, FIRE, the Foundation for Individual Rights and Expression. We live in a moment when free speech, the bedrock of our democracy and of all free societies, is often viewed as suspect, where many argue that the right to free speech is too dangerous, and that even listening to ideological opponents is
